scripts.build: bun --filter @agentv/core build && bun --filter @agentv/eval build && bun --filter agentv build
scripts.verify: bun run build && bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.test: bun --filter @agentv/core test && bun --filter @agentv/eval test && bun --filter agentv test
scripts.publish: bun run build && (cd packages/core && bun publish ; cd ../..) ; (cd packages/eval && bun publish ; cd ../..) ; (cd apps/cli && bun publish ; cd ../..)
scripts.publish:next: bun run build && (cd packages/core && bun publish --tag next ; cd ../..) ; (cd packages/eval && bun publish --tag next ; cd ../..) ; (cd apps/cli && bun publish --tag next ; cd ../..)
scripts.prepare: test -d .git && bunx prek install -t pre-push || true
